utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, hey Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Listen, I need to ask you something. Ok, you know how my step dad's in prison.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. Well, uhm... listen he was supposed to get a weekend furlough, so he'd come to the wedding tomorrow, but he just called and... uhm... well, apparently stabbing Iceman in the exercise yard just couldn't wait till Monday.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So he can't come?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, and so there's no one to walk me down the aisle and... well, I would just really love it if you would do it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Seriously?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, you've... you know, sort of been like a dad to me. I mean, you've always, you know, looked out for me and shared your wisdom...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I am pretty wisdomous.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So... what do you say?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you kidding? Phoebe, I would be honored.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, thank you. I hope... I hope you know how much you mean to me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Listen, I hope... that you know... I don't want you to see your father cry, GO TO YOUR ROOM!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh no, no, no, let your dad get this.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, it's my wedding planner. She's driving me crazy! Hello... Hey, ok, stop screaming! Ok? So, halibut. All right, so salmon, either way. I don't-I don't... it doesn't matter to me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, it matters to me!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I don't care, so you pick!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Did you just hung up on me? All right, look, I need you at the rehearsal dinner tonight at 1800 hours.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-uh. Ok. What time is that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You don't know military time?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why, I must have been in missile training the day they taught that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Just subtract twelve.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok, so... 1800 minus twelve is... one thousand, seven hundred and...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Six o'clock!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok. Hold on. Geller here! No! I said it has to be there by 4 o'clock. Goodbye. Oh, how hard it is to make an ice sculpture?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ice sculpture? That sounds really fancy! I told you I just want a simple wedding.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Please... honey, leave the details to me. Now I wanna make this day as special for you as I can. Now, ok, I was thinking that the harpist should wear white.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What harpist? My friend Marjorie is playing the steel drums.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ooh... she backed out.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: She did? Why?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I made her. Steel drums don't really say "elegant wedding". Nor does Marjorie's overwhelming scent.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! She will shower when Tibet is free.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You look great. I'm so glad we're having this rehearsal dinner, you know, I so rarely get to practice my meals before I eat them.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, what did we say was your one gift to us?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No stupid jokes. I thought that was for the actual wedding.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Rehearse it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Thanks for coming you guys.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, hey, oh... I... I was-I was going for a hand shake.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Is that why your hand is pressed against my crotch?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That is why!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So Rach.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Where is Emma?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, Monica made me send her to my mother's. Apparently babies and weddings don't mix.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you still crying about your damn baby? Pheebs, you gotta keep the line moving, remember, 20 seconds per person. Your see these clowns all the time!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, you're Mike's parents, right?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ah, our little ones are growing up fast, uh?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You know, on the one hand you're happy for them, but on the other hand it's hard to let go.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, I'm not that fond of you either, ok buddy? But I'm just trying to be nice for the kids!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know what I just realized? We have no idea what we're doing in the wedding tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I thought we'd be groomsmen, but wouldn't they have asked us by now? When did they ask you to be their bridesmaid?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh... November?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I wanna say it's not looking good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What's up?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uhm... you haven't told these guys what they're doing in the wedding yet.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Heh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uhm... well, they're not in the wedding.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, this is really awkward Oh, and I can leave!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm sorry you guys but, you know, Mike's got his brother and his friends from school so... you know, you were, you were... if it helps you, you were next in line, you just, you just missed the cut.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, man!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This is like figure skating team all over again. I mean synchronized swimming. I mean- I mean the balance beam. Help me!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: FOOTBALL!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Pheebs, spit that out, that has pork in it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! I though the pot stickers were supposed to be vegetarian!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, I changed them. I, I sent you a fax about it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don't have a fax machine.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ah, well then there are gonna be a few surprises!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can't believe we're gonna be the only people that aren't in this wedding.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know, I hate being left out of things.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And it's a wedding! It'd be weird if I'm not in it...

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Hey guys, how is it going?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Fine. We're just sitting here. Alone. Doing nothing. It's our rehearsal for tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Yeah look, about tomorrow, I... I've got a question for ya. I just found out that one of my groomsmen had had an emergency and can't make it.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What happened?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Who cares, AND?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: ...and I was wondering if... you know, maybe one of you guys...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'll do it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: M-Me, me, me!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: You both wanna do it? Uhm... there's only room for one.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Pick me, I look great in a tux and I will not steal focus.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, Mike, no, no. You wanna pick me, I mean... watch! Huh?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: You know, I really don't feel very comfortable making this decision. You know, Phoebe knows you better, I'm gonna let her choose.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, if Phoebe's choosing, then say hello to Mike's next groomsman.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I will. But I will need a mirror... as he is me!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Please, you're going down!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You are going downer!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Is that what they say on the Figure Skating Team?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I wouldn't know, I didn't make it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So, you know I'm filling in for Phoebe's step dad, tomorrow, right?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah. Hey, thanks for doing that.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, hey, my pleasure. So what are your intentions with my Phoebe?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I intend to marry her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, a wiseacre. . No, no, no, I understand you plan to support your wife by playing the piano? Isn't that kind of unstable?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: No more so than acting.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Strike two!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: You're right. She probably will support me. Hey, unless we move in with you, dad?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Strike three! You only get one more, Mike!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, what did you decide?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I decided to pee.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Mike didn't tell you? You have to choose one of us to be in your wedding. One of his groomsmen fell out.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no, no. I can't choose between you two! I love you both so much!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Just not enough to put us in the original wedding party.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I don't wanna choose! It's . Oh okay, wait. Rach! Listen I have a very special bridesmaid task for you today.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Goody, what is it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, there's a spot open for only one groomsman and you have to choose between Ross and Chandler. So good luck with that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What, what, what, no, I don't wanna do that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right, I guess I'll have to find a new bridesmaid.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'll do it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok, it's 2100 hours. Time for your toast.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Do I have a minute to go to the bathroom?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You had a bathroom break at 2030. Pee on your own time, Mike! . Now, in regard to the toast, okay, you wanna keep them short, nothing kills a rehearsal dinner like long speeches. Okay. You just get in, do your thing and get out!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Is that what you say to Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's 2101 and I am not amused. . Ok, the bride and groom have a few words they'd like to say.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok. Hello everyone and thank you all for being here tonight. So tomorrow's the big event and some of you might not know, but Mike and I didn't get off to the best start. . My friend Joey and I decided to fix each other up with friends so I, I... oh I... hum... I gave it a lot of thought and I fixed him up with my friend Mary Ellen who couldn't be here tonight because... it's not important... she is in rehab. Anyway, so, ok, Joey said that he was fixing me up with his friend Mike, only he didn't have a friend Mike so he just brought, uhm, my Mike and, and but despite, you know... it got... it got good. Ok, I wanna take a moment to mention my mother, who couldn't be here...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And... moment's over! So, ok, uh, I can forget that. I can forget that and uhm... Oh this is funny! Oh, but you need to know that to... that, to... Oh, ok, well, uhm, I . Ok, ok, I, ok, I.... MONICA I CAN'T DO IT LIKE THIS! THIS IS MY WEDDING! OKAY, I DON'T WANT THIS OR THIS OR THIS OK? I JUST WANTED A SIMPLE WEDDING! WHERE MY FIANCEE CAN GO TO THE BATHROOM ANYTIME HE WANTS! You know what? You're done.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: YOU'RE FIRED! Cheers!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Happy wedding day!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, happy my wedding day to you!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okie-dokey, Joey, listen. This is gonna be bridesmaid central, all right? We're gonna have hair and make-up going on in the bathroom and oh, I had to move a couple of things in the fridge to make room for the corsages.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, man! I wouldn't have had breakfast if I knew there was going to be corsages!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi. About last night... I know you are under a lot of stress and even though the things you said hurt me a little bit... My point is, uh, well, I'm willing to take my job back.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, well that's ok. I think you and I will do much better if you're just... here as a bridesmaid.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, is that so? Ok. If that's really what you want, then here... I give you the headset. Well, I don't really want to give you the headset. Well I guess if you're taking over, you should probably return these messages.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow, this is a lot!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh-huh, but I'm sure you can handle this. I mean, I have won awards for my organizational skills, but, uh, I'm sure you'll do fine.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You won awards?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Mm-mh. I printed them out on my computer.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Where's Rach?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She's in her room, why?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I have to talk to her about this groomsman situation, ok? I'm not gonna watch Chandler up there while I'm sitting in the seats like some chump! . Oh! My God! You're breathtaking!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What d'you want?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You haven't by any chance chosen a groomsman yet, have you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, Ross, c'mon, please! Don't make this harder than it already is!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm not! I'm making it easier! Pick me!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, Chandler said that it's really important to him too!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Listen, listen. Whoever you pick is gonna walk down the aisle with you! Now, I promise I won't say a word, but if you pick Chandler he's gonna be whispering stupid jokes in your ear the whole time!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, you are the lesser of two evils!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: YES, YES!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Sven I don't understand what you're saying! What is wrong with the flowers? Lorkins? What the hell are lorkins?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Listen, Mike, if you were Swedish and you were saying the word "lorkins" what flowers would that be?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Orchids?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Right there! That's why I'm marrying you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hello Michael.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Joseph.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: May I have a word with you, please?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: This is... great...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Have a seat. Last night, I tried to welcome you into my family... and instead, you disrespect me... I cannot allow this.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Are you rehearsing for some really bad mafia movie?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: More back talk. And yes, I may be borrowing a few lines from my recent unsuccessful audition for "Family Honor 2: Thissa Time Itsa Personal."

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Joey, I kinda have a lot to do today, what do you want?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I want you to take this seriously! Phoebe is very very important to me, ok? And I wanna make sure that you are gonna take care of her.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Joe, I love Phoebe. She's the single most important thing in my life. I'd die before I let anything happen to her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's what I wanted to hear! Because she's family, ok, and now you're gonna be family, and there is nothing more important in the whole world, than family.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: That must have been one lousy movie.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That was ME!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, can I talk to you about this groomsman thing? If you pick Ross, he'll walk you down the isle just fine. But if you choose me, you'll be getting some comedy!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Even so, I think I'm gonna pick Ross.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Let me tell you why you need to pick me. See, when I was a kid, I was always left out of everything, you know, and it really made me feel... insecure. You know, I was always picked last in gym. Even behind that big fat exchange student who didn't even know the rules to baseball. I mean, this guy would strike out and then run to third. Anyway, If I'm the only one left out of this wedding, I just know that all those feelings are gonna come rushing back.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: All right fine, I pick you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y-Y-YEEESSS! Make "groom" for Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! We're gonna do it my way. Because your way is stupid! Alright I gotta go, I have another call, Reverend. Hello?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm glad we had this little talk.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Yes. Yeah and thanks for all the wedding night advice. That didn't make me uncomfortable at all! Alright, so I'll see everybody tonight?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Bye.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Uhm, did you guys know that there is a giant ice sculpture in the hall?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God, what's it doing here?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ugh, I guess it got sent to the billing address as opposed to the shipping address. Uh! What a pickle.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God, everything is such a mess. Why is this happening to me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How bad do you want to stick your tongue on that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How's it going?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Good. I'm just getting some coffee. So I'm alert for the wedding.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's what I was doing too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, you have fun tonight.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I will.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Me too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait a minute, I know why I'm being such an ass, why are you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm not supposed to tell you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm not supposed to tell you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You told us both we could be in the wedding?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, in my defense, you were not supposed to tell each other.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rachel, only one of us can do it, you have to choose. You and me together again.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Rach, Rach, knock knock.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Who's there?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'll tell you at the wedding.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Hey, I forgot my scarf.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You know what, I can't do this. I don't know which one of you guys to pick.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Oh, you haven't picked yet. Oh good, 'cause I had an idea. I thought it would be fun if the third groomsman was my family dog. Chappy.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? A dog? No! Rachel gets to choose.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow, this is a tough one. I think I'm gonna have to go with the dog.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Alright, wait, so what you're saying is that the chef is at the Hamilton Club, but the food is not and the drinks are there, but the bartender is not? Are you, are you FREAKING KIDDING ME!?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How's it going?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Help me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I want you to be Crazy Bitch again.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Please?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You really want me to come back?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: More than I wanna get married.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok people, we are back in business! Oh God, we've missed you soo much! Ok, go and get your hair and make-up done, and I'll take care of everything.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, what are you guys gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: About what?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: The blizzard. I just saw on the news, it's like the worst snow storm in 20 years! They already closed all the bridges and tunnels.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ooh! But the band and the photographer are coming all the way in from New Jersey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't think they are.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Haha! Looks like you're not going to be in the wedding either. So sorry Pheebs.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, the club lost it's power.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah according to the news, most of the city did.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Since when do you watch the news?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, for your information, since they hired a very hot weather girl.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can't believe you guys aren't going to be able to get married today.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow, you know, it's so beautiful out there. You always wanted to get married outside. Why don't you guys just do it on the street?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, look, it's hardly snowing anymore. I mean you couldn't ask for a more romantic setting. This could be the simple wedding you've always wanted!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What do you think?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I think I wanna get married to you today.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Me too! Monica, do you think we could do it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: AFFIRMATIVE!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: OK LET'S GET THESE CHAIRS OUT HERE! Gunther, hit the Christmas lights. Okay, who left the ice sculpture ON THE STEAM GRATE?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Hey! You made it. Great! Chappy! Hi! Hi! Mom, I know getting married in the street isn't something you approve of...

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: You know, Chappy's too small to handle all this snow. Someone's gonna have to walk him down the aisle.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So technically, would this person be in the wedding?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I guess.

utterance.speaker: Chandler and Ross
utterance.content: I'll do it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, but Chandler, hello... Aren't you scared of dogs?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm not scared. I'll just take little Chappy and... HE CAN SENSE MY FEAR. MY THROAT IS EXPOSED.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I guess I'm in the wedding then. Ha haaa... He stinks!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Level 1 alert. I repeat, level 1. This is not a drill. Okay we've got a situation. The minister just called. He's snowed in. He can't make it.

utterance.content: Oh, no!

utterance.content: Oh hey, don't worry. I'm still ordained from your wedding.

utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, you'd think I'd give up being a minister and start paying to ride the subway? Uhh-uh...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uhm, ministers don't ride the subway for free.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I had to read the Bible pretty carefully, but... yeah we do.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, if Joey does the ceremony, then we have to find someone else to walk Phoebe down the isle.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Na ha ha... Ne he he... Ah ah...

utterance.content: Okay, Mike and Joey, get in position. Chandler, come with me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, Joey's doing the ceremony and Chandler's giving you away.

utterance.content: Oh, okay. Hi new dad.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, you're ready to do this?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uhuh, uhuh... Oh my God! This is really happening.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Phoebe, I'm so happy for you honey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, thank you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I love you. Oh, wait, wait, wait! No hugs. The dresses... Oh what the hell.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I love you guys.

utterance.speaker: Rachel and Monica
utterance.content: I love you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. It's zero hour. All teams execute on my count. Let's get this bad boy on the road.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is it okay that I want you to wear that head set in bed tonight?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I have you scheduled for nudity at 2300 hours.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay Marjorie, hit it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Geez Ross, you could have showered.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's the dog.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Groomsman, groomsman, why are you just standing there, where is your bridesmaid? We've got a broken arrow. Bridesmaid down! Oh, that's me.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ready?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh wait, oh no. Wait.

utterance.content: Wow! Aren't you gonna be cold?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don't care... I'll be my something blue.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You look beautiful.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: My God! Aren't you freezing?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Na-ah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Friends, family, dog... Thank you all for being here to witness this blessed event. The cold has now spread to my special place... so I'm gonna do the short version of this. Phoebe and Mike are perfect for each other. And I know I speak for every one here... when I wish them a lifetime of happiness. Who has the rings?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: When I was growing up, I didn't have a normal mom and dad, or a regular family like everybody else, and I always knew that something was missing. But now I'm standing here today, knowing that I have everything I'm ever gonna need... You are my family.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Phoebe you're so beautiful. You're so kind, you're so generous. You're so wonderfully weird. Every day with you is an adventure, and I can't believe how lucky I am, and I can't wait to share my life with you forever.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh wait, oh I forgot... and uhm... I love you... and you have nice eyes.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I love you too.

utterance.content: Uh Joey...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.content: Chappy's heart rate has slowed way down.

utterance.content: Oh, okay. Phoebe, do you take this man to be your husband?

utterance.content: I do.

utterance.content: Mike, do you take this woman to be your wife?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I do.

utterance.content: That really was an incredible wedding.
